title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 647.15 - Entry of decision
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 647.15 - Entry of decision

State Regulations

The notation by the board's docket clerk of a decision or
order of the board, its chairman or any member thereof, constitutes entry of
the decision or order. The board's docket clerk shall, on the date the decision
or order is entered, mail to all parties a copy of the decision or order. Copies of final decisions of appeals shall be sent to all persons making a
limited appearance or appearing as amicus curiae, and be sent to the county
clerks for the counties wherein the affected wetlands are
located. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
647.15

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
